trans-unit.source: Diagnosing issues with dependencies in Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Diagnosing issues with dependencies in Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Find failures and slow performance caused by dependencies
trans-unit.target: Find failures and slow performance caused by dependencies

trans-unit.source: Diagnosing issues with dependencies in Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Diagnosing issues with dependencies in Application Insights

trans-unit.source: A *dependency* is an external component that is called by your app.
trans-unit.target: A *dependency* is an external component that is called by your app.

trans-unit.source: It's typically a service called using HTTP, or a database, or a file system.
trans-unit.target: It's typically a service called using HTTP, or a database, or a file system.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio Application Insights, you can easily see how long your application waits for dependencies and how often a dependency call fails.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio Application Insights, you can easily see how long your application waits for dependencies and how often a dependency call fails.

trans-unit.source: Where you can use it
trans-unit.target: Where you can use it

trans-unit.source: Out of the box dependency monitoring is currently available for:
trans-unit.target: Out of the box dependency monitoring is currently available for:

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET web apps and services running on an IIS server or on Azure
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET web apps and services running on an IIS server or on Azure

trans-unit.source: Java web apps
trans-unit.target: Java web apps

trans-unit.source: For other types, such as device apps, you can write your own monitor using the [TrackDependency API](app-insights-api-custom-events-metrics.md#track-dependency).
trans-unit.target: For other types, such as device apps, you can write your own monitor using the [TrackDependency API](app-insights-api-custom-events-metrics.md#track-dependency).

trans-unit.source: The out-of-the-box dependency monitor currently reports calls to these types of dependencies:
trans-unit.target: The out-of-the-box dependency monitor currently reports calls to these types of dependencies:

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET

trans-unit.source: SQL databases
trans-unit.target: SQL databases

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET web and WCF services that use HTTP-based bindings
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET web and WCF services that use HTTP-based bindings

trans-unit.source: Local or remote HTTP calls
trans-unit.target: Local or remote HTTP calls

trans-unit.source: Azure DocumentDb, table, blob storage, and queue
trans-unit.target: Azure DocumentDb, table, blob storage, and queue

trans-unit.source: Java
trans-unit.target: Java

trans-unit.source: Calls to a database through a [JDBC](http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/technotes/guides/jdbc/) driver, such as MySQL, SQL Server, PostgreSQL or SQLite.
trans-unit.target: Calls to a database through a [JDBC](http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/technotes/guides/jdbc/) driver, such as MySQL, SQL Server, PostgreSQL or SQLite.

trans-unit.source: Again, you could write your own SDK calls to monitor other dependencies.
trans-unit.target: Again, you could write your own SDK calls to monitor other dependencies.

trans-unit.source: To set up dependency monitoring
trans-unit.target: To set up dependency monitoring

trans-unit.source: Install the appropriate agent for the host server.
trans-unit.target: Install the appropriate agent for the host server.

trans-unit.source: Platform
trans-unit.target: Platform

trans-unit.source: Install
trans-unit.target: Install

trans-unit.source: IIS Server
trans-unit.target: IIS Server

trans-unit.source: Status Monitor
trans-unit.target: Status Monitor

trans-unit.source: Azure Web App
trans-unit.target: Azure Web App

trans-unit.source: Application Insights Extension
trans-unit.target: Application Insights Extension

trans-unit.source: Java web server
trans-unit.target: Java web server

trans-unit.source: Java web apps
trans-unit.target: Java web apps

trans-unit.source: The Status Monitor for IIS Servers doesn't need you to rebuild your source project with the Application Insights SDK.
trans-unit.target: The Status Monitor for IIS Servers doesn't need you to rebuild your source project with the Application Insights SDK.

trans-unit.source: Diagnosing dependency performance issues
trans-unit.target: Diagnosing dependency performance issues

trans-unit.source: To assess the performance of requests at your server:
trans-unit.target: To assess the performance of requests at your server:

trans-unit.source: In the Overview page of your application in Application Insights, click the Performance tile
trans-unit.target: In the Overview page of your application in Application Insights, click the Performance tile

trans-unit.source: Scroll down to look at the grid of requests:
trans-unit.target: Scroll down to look at the grid of requests:

trans-unit.source: List of requests with averages and counts
trans-unit.target: List of requests with averages and counts

trans-unit.source: The top one is taking very long.
trans-unit.target: The top one is taking very long.

trans-unit.source: Let's see if we can find out where the time is spent.
trans-unit.target: Let's see if we can find out where the time is spent.

trans-unit.source: Click that row to see individual request events:
trans-unit.target: Click that row to see individual request events:

trans-unit.source: List of request occurrences
trans-unit.target: List of request occurrences

trans-unit.source: Click any long-running instance to inspect it further.
trans-unit.target: Click any long-running instance to inspect it further.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] Scroll down a bit to choose an instance.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] Scroll down a bit to choose an instance.

trans-unit.source: Latency in the pipeline might mean that the data for the top instances is incomplete.
trans-unit.target: Latency in the pipeline might mean that the data for the top instances is incomplete.

trans-unit.source: Scroll down to the remote dependency calls related to this request:
trans-unit.target: Scroll down to the remote dependency calls related to this request:

trans-unit.source: Find Calls to Remote Dependencies, identify unusual Duration
trans-unit.target: Find Calls to Remote Dependencies, identify unusual Duration

trans-unit.source: It looks like most of the time servicing this request was spent in a call to a local service.
trans-unit.target: It looks like most of the time servicing this request was spent in a call to a local service.

trans-unit.source: Select that row to get more information:
trans-unit.target: Select that row to get more information:

trans-unit.source: Click through that remote dependency to identify the culprit
trans-unit.target: Click through that remote dependency to identify the culprit

trans-unit.source: The detail includes sufficient information to diagnose the problem.
trans-unit.target: The detail includes sufficient information to diagnose the problem.

trans-unit.source: Failures
trans-unit.target: Failures

trans-unit.source: If there are failed requests, click the chart.
trans-unit.target: If there are failed requests, click the chart.

trans-unit.source: Click the failed requests chart
trans-unit.target: Click the failed requests chart

trans-unit.source: Click through a request type and request instance, to find a failed call to a remote dependency.
trans-unit.target: Click through a request type and request instance, to find a failed call to a remote dependency.

trans-unit.source: Click a request type, click the instance to get to a different view of the same instance, click it to get exception details.
trans-unit.target: Click a request type, click the instance to get to a different view of the same instance, click it to get exception details.

trans-unit.source: Custom dependency tracking
trans-unit.target: Custom dependency tracking

trans-unit.source: The standard dependency-tracking module automatically discovers external dependencies such as databases and REST APIs.
trans-unit.target: The standard dependency-tracking module automatically discovers external dependencies such as databases and REST APIs.

trans-unit.source: But you might want some additional components to be treated in the same way.
trans-unit.target: But you might want some additional components to be treated in the same way.

trans-unit.source: You can write code that sends dependency information, using the same [TrackDependency API](app-insights-api-custom-events-metrics.md#track-dependency) that is used by the standard modules.
trans-unit.target: You can write code that sends dependency information, using the same [TrackDependency API](app-insights-api-custom-events-metrics.md#track-dependency) that is used by the standard modules.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you build your code with an assembly that you didn't write yourself, you could time all the calls to it, to find out what contribution it makes to your response times.
trans-unit.target: For example, if you build your code with an assembly that you didn't write yourself, you could time all the calls to it, to find out what contribution it makes to your response times.

trans-unit.source: To have this data displayed in the dependency charts in Application Insights, send it using `TrackDependency`.
trans-unit.target: To have this data displayed in the dependency charts in Application Insights, send it using `TrackDependency`.

trans-unit.source: If you want to switch off the standard dependency tracking module, remove the reference to DependencyTrackingTelemetryModule in [ApplicationInsights.config](app-insights-configuration-with-applicationinsights-config.md).
trans-unit.target: If you want to switch off the standard dependency tracking module, remove the reference to DependencyTrackingTelemetryModule in [ApplicationInsights.config](app-insights-configuration-with-applicationinsights-config.md).

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
